settings.text: Do you work in the sports industry selling products and services to grassroots or professional clubs? Join our International Agents programme and earn money promoting PitcheroGPS.

PitcheroGPS is the first GPS Tracker Solution designed for all teams across all standards of sport. From amatuer to semi-professional, schools to university, private academies to full-time professional teams.

Our market-leading GPS Player Trackers, approved by FIFA and World Rugby are used globally by teams to maximise their training and optimise their game.

  • PitcheroGPS is engineered for all standards of football (soccer), rugby union, rugby league and hockey. 
  • The GPS system can be used worldwide and the analysis software does not require advanced sports science.
  • All technology is developed and manufactured to the highest standards in the UK.

To support our global growth programme, we seek International Agents who can represent PitcheroGPS in all regions outside of the United Kingdom.

Requirements

  • A minimum 5 years of leadership experience selling sports products and services to the football, rugby or hockey sector in a local region.
  • Access to marketing channels targeting coaches, team managers and club officials.
  • Exceptional local knowledge of the sports market.

Agent program benefits

  • High uncapped commission paid within 10 days
  • Marketing, content and sales support
  • Product support
  • Regional exclusivity

Important: The Agent is not a franchisee or sub-division of Pitch Hero Limited. The agent will act as an introducer only sourcing qualified lead referrals to PitcheroGPS sales staff based in the UK. 

To apply to be an International Agent complete the appication form below. A member of the team will be in touch within 48 hours.

PitcheroGPS is the first GPS Tracker Solution designed for all teams, across all standards of sport. From amatuer to semi-professional, schools to university, private academy to full-time professional teams.

Our market-leading GPS Player Trackers, approved by FIFA and World Rugby are used globally by teams to maximise their training and optimise their game.

PitcheroGPS is designed specifically for all standards of football (soccer), rugby union, rugby league and hockey. 

The system can be used anywhere in the world and does not require advanced sports science.

All technology is developed and manufactured to they highest standards in the UK.

To support our global growth programme, we are is seeking International Agents who can represents PitcheroGPS in all regions outside of the United Kingdom.

Requirements

A minimum 5 years of leadership experience selling sports products and services to the football, rugby or hockey sector in a local region.

Access to exiting market channels targeting coaches, team managers and club officials.

Exceptional local knowledge of the sports market.

Important; The Agent is not a franchisee or sub-division of Pitch Hero Limited. The agent will act as an introducer only sourcing qualified lead referrals to PitcheroGPS sales staff based in the UK.
